name: AngelStrike
description:
AngelStrike is an exciting 2D side-scrolling shoot 'em up featuring captivating pixel-art, and a variety of action-packed missions. Play solo or team up with friends in local co-op to rescue refugees, stealthily deliver supplies, escort your allies, and take down hordes of machines in 40 challenging levels across five different areas!
The Global SuperIntelligence Authority promises to save us. They promise to take care of us. They promise they can solve all of our problems. Unfortunately, like every other authority who has claimed they can save us, the GSIA has one fatal flaw. They must crush every single person who refuses to cooperate!

Game Features

  • 40 Levels in 5 different areas
  • Controllers supported for 1-3 players*
  • Up to 4 people in local co-op with keyboard*
  • More than 40 call-sign badges
  • Customizable controls
  • Hand crafted pixel art
  • 8 different helicopters in 8 different colors to choose from
  • Optional friendly-fire mode for an extra challenge
  • Optional screen shake
  • 18 Achievements

*Keyboard is required to play with all 4 players (3 controllers + 1 keyboard). This is the reason why Valve requires "No Controller Support" to be marked. Keyboard can also be single player.
